personalInfo.name: Piyush
personalInfo.myDescription: Tech-enthusiast who loves working with new technologies. Intellectually curious and looking for challenges and opportunities in different areas. Currently working as a backend and cloud developer with expertise in AWS, Java and Spring boot.

responsibilities: Responsible for developing and maintaining a group of applications used in the Communication and Reservation domain
Responsible for developing and maintaining backend architecture of Virtual Assist of Delta.
Backend Stack: Java | SpringBoot | C# | MYSQL .
Responsible for developing and maintaining features for Intraday Liquidity Application.
Designed and developed application to fetch and display payments between banks. Handled millions of payment and performed load testing.
Backend Stack: Java | SpringBoot | MYSQL | Docker | Jmeter.
Frontend Stack: React | Redux | Javascript | HTML/CSS .
Worked on Spring, Spring Boot and Microservices with Cloud,Microservices and APIfication(CMA) unit.
Successfully delivered an Incentive Management application for US based automobile company. Developed APIs and microservices using Java and Spring Boot and used MySQL for queries.
